oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Real Records for Real Cattlemen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Weikel, Julie M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: beef production industry
communication
dependable records
veterinarian
accurate data
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The acceptance of the concept of a certain desirable degree of integration within the beef production industry has created a need for increased communication among the segments-i.e. for accurate and dependable records as well as the mechanism for sharing that information. The veterinarian is ideally positioned to help his client implement such records, collect accurate data, and assist in interpreting the conclusions and analyses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1993; 190
